column6: SCORCHED EARTH FINALE Bruce Banner has found the key to stopping the Intelligencia's assault and it requires a team-up of epic proportions! The two Hulks unite for something that's red, green, and gamma-infused throughout!
column8: | colorist:Bettie Breitweiser | penciller:Gabriel Hardman | penciller:Mark Robinson | penciller (cover):Ed McGuinness | writer:Jeff Parker | editor:Jordan White
